create_bogus: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bogus(test int auto_increment, primary key (test));
create_calendar: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS PSBCalendars;
create_event: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS PSBEvents;
create_guild: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS PSBGuilds;
create_user: CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS %s@%s IDENTIFIED BY '%s';
grant_calendar: GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON PSBCalendar.* TO %s@%s;
grant_guild: GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON PSBGuild.* TO %s@%s;
grant_event: GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON PSBEvents.* TO %s@%s;
update_bogus: UPDATE bogus SET test='0' WHERE test='65536';
